name: Lingering Sun
description:
Lost in a bizarre world you must find new gear and search for a way out.

Explore. Evolve. Escape.

Engage strange creatures with a simple yet deep combat system.

Starting unarmed and powerless amass an arsenal of over 100 weapons and abilities to aid you.

Explore a vast, varied, interconnected world where you never know what lies around the next corner... be it some lifesaving gear or an enormous monster.
